text: Sarah Marie Jeffery (born April 3, 1996) is a Canadian actress, singer and dancer. She is known for her work on the NBC series Shades of Blue and Disney Channel's Descendants franchise. She also plays Maggie Vera on the CW series Charmed. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Vancouver Category:Canadian child actors Category:Canadian dancers Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian singers
title: Sarah Jeffery
